name: Strive to Surpass me, Roronoa Zoro!!!
type: East Blue/The Seven Warlords of the Sea
effect: [Counter] You may rest 1 of your cards: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.
trigger: [Trigger] You may rest 1 of your cards: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 7000 base power or less.
